summary:
Welcome to my LinkedIn profile!

When we're not connected yet...
You can send me an invitation and become part of my network.

When you have tips, leads, questions or are interested in my expertise...
Please send me an e-mail or give me a call if I or my network can help you with something.

A short introduction...

I see myself as a Manager Finance & Control who has the ability to transform figures into "added value" for the entrepreneur and his company and a connection is made between "Money & Business".

After many years of experience in Finance, Accounting, Controlling & HR in multinational companies and some smaller firms, I founded SminFin from which I operate "ad interim" and give support to customers.

The key word and common thread throughout my carreer is called innovation and the "Big Four" ethical values in my work I take as a priority are... integrity, confidence, cooperation and quality.

I am determined, stick to deadlines, eager to learn more, eager to share my knowledge. Accurate with an eye for detail. Good leadership, people and communication skills.
